changeSet.comment: 节点分享表增加允许编辑
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `vika_node_share_setting` ADD COLUMN `allow_edit` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '是否允许他人编辑(0:否,1:是)' AFTER `allow_save`;

changeSet.author: Chambers
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `vika_player_activity` ( `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `user_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '用户ID(关联#vika_user#id)', `actions` json DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '动作集合体', `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, UNIQUE KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='玩家系统-活动表';
